steps.description: Go to North Kaladim and pickpocket Founy Jestands until you receive Stained Parchment Top.
Go to Neriak Third Gate and pickpocket Tani N`Mar until you receive Stained Parchment Bottom.
Go to Plane of Hate and loot Book of Souls (ground spawn at +171, -326 on top of a dresser).
Buy 2x Bottle of Milk from a Baking Vendor (Klen Ironstove, Eastern Trade Building, PoK | Loc: -84, +239).

Go to Highpass Hold and speak to Anson McBale. He is in a hidden area of the zone that is only accessible by an underwater tunnel. Give him Stained Parchment Top, Stained Parchment Bottom, Book of Souls, and 2x Bottle of Milk to receive Sealed Note.
Go to Kithicor Forest and find Renux Herkanor. Give her Sealed Note to spawn Renux Herkanor. Kill her and loot Jagged Diamond Dagger.
Go to Plane of Hate and kill Maestro of Rancor to loot Maestro's Symphony Page 24 Top.
Go to Plane of Sky and kill Keeper of Souls to loot Keeper's Soul.
Go to East Freeport and find Eldreth. Give him Jagged Diamond Dagger, Maestro's Symphony Page 24 Top, and Keeper's Soul to receive Ragebringer.
